Vlad keeps his eyes closed and remains in the same position. He can't 
recognize the voice, and even then, it feels blurred.

Vlad: Neg... I feel sick as a stravag... Where am I anyways? What 
happened?

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "cardhead649" <cardhead649@y...> wrote:
> Phoenix had been wandering around for quite some time - her sense of 
> direction is pretty bad in most indoor settings (it took her months 
> to learn her way around Rogue Star).  By accident, she finds Vlad's 
> cell and notices his difficulties.  "Hello," she calls softly, "are 
> you all right?"
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., "Nic" <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote:
> > Whatever had happened, Vlad sure didn't remember. Last thing, 
there 
> > was that Drake insisting about some medication...
> > 
> > His head felt as if it was spinning like a gauss slug, and his 
> stomach 
> > felt nauseous like freebirth! He stayed there, lying on his back 
> with 
> > his eyes closed and just concentrated on his breathing.
